info.name: AnimeUltima for nightOwls <base theme>
info.description:
this is a theme for Animeultima.tv ..
the idea of this theme came from a request for an easy on eyes
night time theme for guys dat use the site too much.. 
this is not a final product .. it is merely a recoloring of the site in basic black and 
fixing the fonts to go along with it.. 
its is a simple code theme dat even beginners can edit it to their liking 
and they have my approval already xD
info.additionalInfo:
this is basic theme with basic codes .. the alterations should be easy if u want to 
change ( backgrounds , fonts , font size and coloring )
